about_the_game:
BOG WITCH is an action arcade game where you play as a BOG WITCH stopping intruders from entering your bog. Protect your hut from goblins, businessmen and other invaders by hurling potions at them, because face it, as a BOG WITCH the last thing you want in your bog is anyone else. So grab your ingredients, mix them up, and get chucking so you can get back to sitting in front of the fire, drinking tea, and cackling.

If you feel particularly friendly though, feel free to invite another BOG WITCH to hurl potions with you in local co-op multiplayer.


Now GET OUT ME BOG!

So grab your ingredients, mix them up, and get chucking so you can get back to sitting in front of the fire, drinking tea, and cackling.

If you feel particularly friendly though, feel free to invite another BOG WITCH to hurl potions with you in local co-op multiplayer.

name: Bog Witch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5500, GeForce 720,or Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (or greater) or AMD Radeon HD 7600 (or greater)
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
